# Support merging cells vertically

Requirement: '^^' in a cell indicates it should be merged with the cell above

.
| A                |||
|------|------|------|
| B    | C    | D    |
| ^^   | E    | F    |
| G          || H    |
| ^^         || I    |
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th colspan="3">A</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td rowspan="2">B</td>
<td>C</td>
<td>D</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>E</td>
<td>F</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan="2" rowspan="2">G</td>
<td>H</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>I</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.

Should work with multilines

.
| A                |||
|------|------|------|
| B    | C    | D    \
| B    | C    | D    |
| ^^   | E    | F    \
|      | E    | F    |

.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th colspan="3">A</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td rowspan="2">
<p>B
B</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>C
C</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>D
D</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<p>E
E</p>
</td>
<td>
<p>F
F</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.
